2/2/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $964,286 through salary arbitration...

Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2020, hitting .619 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 8/19/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/24/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $8,850,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 8/22/2024...
10/29/2025: Signed a contract extension with Chicago (N), $2,840,000 per year, for 2 years.
